XNicholas Harris Nicolas, and Edward Tyrrell. A Chronicle of London, from 1079 to 1483. London: Longman, 1827.
_description: A proverbial couplet inserted in a chronicle.

BLHar565.Transcription: With reste and Peesa man schal best encrees
BLHar565.Note: Couplet inserted in chronicle, concluding account of the siege of Rokesburgh Castle.
